DataElement.preferredName: Total Neurologic Function Scale Score Assessment Performed Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The total numeric value measured, assigned or computed related to the assessment of the Neurologic Function Scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Total Neurologic Function Scale Score Assessment Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._A 25-point scale used to evaluate the severity of gross neurologic dysfunction by scoring 15 disabilities across multiple domains._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._Executed and carried through to completion.
